summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CRM Import Contacts and SMS Marketing Campaign features. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate) and frontend UI is working well (92.9% success rate). All core features implemented and accessible.

design_issues.issue: Template editing form not immediately visible when clicking templates

passed_tests: Import Contacts page UI with file upload functionality
Admin page with SMS Templates tab
SMS templates display with placeholders information
Navigation between Dashboard, Import, and Admin pages
File upload requirements and instructions display
Admin tabs (Users, Banks, Dealers, Cars, SMS, Trash)
User management and role assignment functionality
SMS template content display (Marketing templates visible)
